About Me

I am a Web Developer and a life long learner who is always seeking to expand my knowledge base. I am a creative thinker and I like solving interesting problems. My focus languages are Ruby on Rails, Javascript, HTML, CSS with some SQL and Angular JS experience. I practice Object Oriented Design, Agile Development, Version Control with some TDD experience.
